h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: As a required boss fight, you'll encounter the Macaque Chief in multiple points when exploring The New West and progressing to reach the Sage's Will held by Goldenbrow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief'.
The content is as follows:
As a required boss fight, you'll encounter the Macaque Chief in multiple points when exploring The New West and progressing to reach the Sage's Will held by Goldenbrow.
